title: 3Bed/2Bath, spacious, great location!
map_address: 4601 E St Elmo Rd near S Pleasant Valley Rd
posting_body: This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1180 Sq.
Kingfisher Creek is a quaint boutique apartment community nestled perfectly in the middle of several parks on the Southside of Austin.
Just minutes from Austin-Bergstrom Airport Kingfisher Creek is in the neighborhood of everywhere you want to be.
With less than 50 homes in the community you will an exclusive home with all of the features without the price tag.
Each home has a spacious and well laid out floor plan perfect for entertaining or relaxing.
Call or stop by today to get your name on the list and make Kingfisher Creek delight you with all of the touches of home you didn’t know you were missing.
Dishwasher, Walk-In Closets*, Extra Storage, En-suite Bathroom*, Microwave, Private Front Entrances*, Emergency Alert System in each home, Patio or Balcony, Washer/Dryer Connections
Picnic Area, 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance, Business Center, Professional, On-Site Management Team, Clubhouse, Pet Friendly, Laundry Facilities
